18#include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/FramebufferGL.h"

35namespace rx
36{
37
38ContextGL::ContextGL(const gl::State &state,
39 gl::ErrorSet *errorSet,
40 const std::shared_ptr<RendererGL> &renderer,
41 RobustnessVideoMemoryPurgeStatus robustnessVideoMemoryPurgeStatus)
42 : ContextImpl(state, errorSet),
43 mRenderer(renderer),
44 mRobustnessVideoMemoryPurgeStatus(robustnessVideoMemoryPurgeStatus)
45{}
46
47ContextGL::~ContextGL() {}
48
49angle::Result ContextGL::initialize()
50{
51 return angle::Result::Continue;
52}
53
54CompilerImpl *ContextGL::createCompiler()
55{
56 return new CompilerGL(getFunctions());
57}
58
59ShaderImpl *ContextGL::createShader(const gl::ShaderState &data)
60{
61 const FunctionsGL *functions = getFunctions();
62 GLuint shader = functions->createShader(ToGLenum(data.getShaderType()));
63
64 return new ShaderGL(data, shader, mRenderer->getMultiviewImplementationType(), mRenderer);
65}
66
67ProgramImpl *ContextGL::createProgram(const gl::ProgramState &data)
68{
69 return new ProgramGL(data, getFunctions(), getFeaturesGL(), getStateManager(), mRenderer);
70}
71
72FramebufferImpl *ContextGL::createFramebuffer(const gl::FramebufferState &data)
73{
74 const FunctionsGL *funcs = getFunctions();
75
76 GLuint fbo = 0;
77 funcs->genFramebuffers(1, &fbo);
78
79 return new FramebufferGL(data, fbo, false, false);
80}
81
82TextureImpl *ContextGL::createTexture(const gl::TextureState &state)
83{
84 const FunctionsGL *functions = getFunctions();
85 StateManagerGL *stateManager = getStateManager();
86
87 GLuint texture = 0;
88 functions->genTextures(1, &texture);
89 stateManager->bindTexture(state.getType(), texture);
90
91 return new TextureGL(state, texture);
92}
93
94RenderbufferImpl *ContextGL::createRenderbuffer(const gl::RenderbufferState &state)
95{
96 const FunctionsGL *functions = getFunctions();
97 StateManagerGL *stateManager = getStateManager();
98
99 GLuint renderbuffer = 0;
100 functions->genRenderbuffers(1, &renderbuffer);
101 stateManager->bindRenderbuffer(GL_RENDERBUFFER, renderbuffer);
102
103 return new RenderbufferGL(state, renderbuffer);
104}
105
106BufferImpl *ContextGL::createBuffer(const gl::BufferState &state)
107{
108 const FunctionsGL *functions = getFunctions();
109
110 GLuint buffer = 0;
111 functions->genBuffers(1, &buffer);
112
113 return new BufferGL(state, buffer);
114}
115
116VertexArrayImpl *ContextGL::createVertexArray(const gl::VertexArrayState &data)
117{
118 return new VertexArrayGL(data, getFunctions(), getStateManager());
119}
120
121QueryImpl *ContextGL::createQuery(gl::QueryType type)
122{
123 switch (type)
124 {
125 case gl::QueryType::CommandsCompleted:
126 return new SyncQueryGL(type, getFunctions());
127
128 default:
129 return new StandardQueryGL(type, getFunctions(), getStateManager());
130 }
131}
132
133FenceNVImpl *ContextGL::createFenceNV()
134{
135 const FunctionsGL *functions = getFunctions();
136 if (FenceNVGL::Supported(functions))
137 {
138 return new FenceNVGL(functions);
139 }
140 else
141 {
142 ASSERT(FenceNVSyncGL::Supported(functions));
143 return new FenceNVSyncGL(functions);
144 }
145}
146
147SyncImpl *ContextGL::createSync()
148{
149 return new SyncGL(getFunctions());
150}
151
152TransformFeedbackImpl *ContextGL::createTransformFeedback(const gl::TransformFeedbackState &state)
153{
154 return new TransformFeedbackGL(state, getFunctions(), getStateManager());
155}
156
157SamplerImpl *ContextGL::createSampler(const gl::SamplerState &state)
158{
159 return new SamplerGL(state, getFunctions(), getStateManager());
160}
161
162ProgramPipelineImpl *ContextGL::createProgramPipeline(const gl::ProgramPipelineState &data)
163{
164 return new ProgramPipelineGL(data, getFunctions());
165}
166
167MemoryObjectImpl *ContextGL::createMemoryObject()
168{
169 const FunctionsGL *functions = getFunctions();
170
171 GLuint memoryObject = 0;
172 functions->createMemoryObjectsEXT(1, &memoryObject);
173
174 return new MemoryObjectGL(memoryObject);
175}
176
177SemaphoreImpl *ContextGL::createSemaphore()
178{
179 const FunctionsGL *functions = getFunctions();
180
181 GLuint semaphore = 0;
182 functions->genSemaphoresEXT(1, &semaphore);
183
184 return new SemaphoreGL(semaphore);
185}
186
187OverlayImpl *ContextGL::createOverlay(const gl::OverlayState &state)
188{
189 // Not implemented.
190 return new OverlayImpl(state);
191}
192
193angle::Result ContextGL::flush(const gl::Context *context)
194{
195 return mRenderer->flush();
196}
197
198angle::Result ContextGL::finish(const gl::Context *context)
199{
200 return mRenderer->finish();
201}
202
203ANGLE_INLINE angle::Result ContextGL::setDrawArraysState(const gl::Context *context,
204 GLint first,
205 GLsizei count,
206 GLsizei instanceCount)
207{
208 if (context->getStateCache().hasAnyActiveClientAttrib())
209 {
210 const gl::State &glState = context->getState();
211 const gl::ProgramExecutable *executable = getState().getProgramExecutable();
212 const gl::VertexArray *vao = glState.getVertexArray();
213 const VertexArrayGL *vaoGL = GetImplAs<VertexArrayGL>(vao);
214
215 ANGLE_TRY(vaoGL->syncClientSideData(context, executable->getActiveAttribLocationsMask(),
216 first, count, instanceCount));
217
218#if defined(ANGLE_STATE_VALIDATION_ENABLED)
219 vaoGL->validateState();
220#endif // ANGLE_STATE_VALIDATION_ENABLED
221 }
222
223 const angle::FeaturesGL &features = getFeaturesGL();
224 if (features.setPrimitiveRestartFixedIndexForDrawArrays.enabled)
225 {
226 StateManagerGL *stateManager = getStateManager();
227 constexpr GLuint primitiveRestartIndex = gl::GetPrimitiveRestartIndexFromType<GLuint>();
228 ANGLE_TRY(stateManager->setPrimitiveRestartIndex(context, primitiveRestartIndex));
229 }
230
231 return angle::Result::Continue;
232}
233
234ANGLE_INLINE angle::Result ContextGL::setDrawElementsState(const gl::Context *context,
235 GLsizei count,
236 gl::DrawElementsType type,
237 const void *indices,
238 GLsizei instanceCount,
239 const void **outIndices)
240{
241 const gl::State &glState = context->getState();
242 const gl::ProgramExecutable *executable = getState().getProgramExecutable();
243 const gl::VertexArray *vao = glState.getVertexArray();
244 const gl::StateCache &stateCache = context->getStateCache();
245
246 if (stateCache.hasAnyActiveClientAttrib() || vao->getElementArrayBuffer() == nullptr)
247 {
248 const VertexArrayGL *vaoGL = GetImplAs<VertexArrayGL>(vao);
249 ANGLE_TRY(vaoGL->syncDrawElementsState(context, executable->getActiveAttribLocationsMask(),
250 count, type, indices, instanceCount,
251 glState.isPrimitiveRestartEnabled(), outIndices));
252 }
253 else
254 {
255 *outIndices = indices;
256 }
257
258 const angle::FeaturesGL &features = getFeaturesGL();
259 if (glState.isPrimitiveRestartEnabled() && features.emulatePrimitiveRestartFixedIndex.enabled)
260 {
261 StateManagerGL *stateManager = getStateManager();
262
263 GLuint primitiveRestartIndex = gl::GetPrimitiveRestartIndex(type);
264 ANGLE_TRY(stateManager->setPrimitiveRestartIndex(context, primitiveRestartIndex));
265 }
266
267#if defined(ANGLE_STATE_VALIDATION_ENABLED)
268 const VertexArrayGL *vaoGL = GetImplAs<VertexArrayGL>(vao);
269 vaoGL->validateState();
270#endif // ANGLE_STATE_VALIDATION_ENABLED
271
272 return angle::Result::Continue;
273}
274
275angle::Result ContextGL::drawArrays(const gl::Context *context,
276 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
277 GLint first,
278 GLsizei count)
279{
280 const gl::Program *program = context->getState().getProgram();
281 const bool usesMultiview = program->usesMultiview();
282 const GLsizei instanceCount = usesMultiview ? program->getNumViews() : 0;
283
284#if defined(ANGLE_STATE_VALIDATION_ENABLED)
285 validateState();
286#endif
287
288 ANGLE_TRY(setDrawArraysState(context, first, count, instanceCount));
289 if (!usesMultiview)
290 {
291 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, getFunctions()->drawArrays(ToGLenum(mode), first, count));
292 }
293 else
294 {
295 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, getFunctions()->drawArraysInstanced(ToGLenum(mode), first, count,
296 instanceCount));
297 }
298 return angle::Result::Continue;
299}
300
301angle::Result ContextGL::drawArraysInstanced(const gl::Context *context,
302 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
303 GLint first,
304 GLsizei count,
305 GLsizei instanceCount)
306{
307 GLsizei adjustedInstanceCount = instanceCount;
308 const gl::Program *program = context->getState().getProgram();
309 if (program->usesMultiview())
310 {
311 adjustedInstanceCount *= program->getNumViews();
312 }
313
314 ANGLE_TRY(setDrawArraysState(context, first, count, adjustedInstanceCount));
315 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, getFunctions()->drawArraysInstanced(ToGLenum(mode), first, count,
316 adjustedInstanceCount));
317 return angle::Result::Continue;
318}
319
320gl::AttributesMask ContextGL::updateAttributesForBaseInstance(const gl::Program *program,
321 GLuint baseInstance)
322{
323 const gl::ProgramExecutable *executable = getState().getProgramExecutable();
324 gl::AttributesMask attribToUpdateMask;
325
326 if (baseInstance != 0)
327 {
328 const FunctionsGL *functions = getFunctions();
329 const auto &attribs = mState.getVertexArray()->getVertexAttributes();
330 const auto &bindings = mState.getVertexArray()->getVertexBindings();
331 for (GLuint attribIndex = 0; attribIndex < gl::MAX_VERTEX_ATTRIBS; attribIndex++)
332 {
333 const gl::VertexAttribute &attrib = attribs[attribIndex];
334 const gl::VertexBinding &binding = bindings[attrib.bindingIndex];
335 if (executable->isAttribLocationActive(attribIndex) && binding.getDivisor() != 0)
336 {
337 attribToUpdateMask.set(attribIndex);
338 const char *p = static_cast<const char *>(attrib.pointer);
339 const size_t sourceStride = gl::ComputeVertexAttributeStride(attrib, binding);
340 const void *newPointer = p + sourceStride * baseInstance;
341
342 const BufferGL *buffer = GetImplAs<BufferGL>(binding.getBuffer().get());
343 // We often stream data from scratch buffers when client side data is being used
344 // and that information is in VertexArrayGL.
345 // Assert that the buffer is non-null because this case isn't handled.
346 ASSERT(buffer);
347 getStateManager()->bindBuffer(gl::BufferBinding::Array, buffer->getBufferID());
348 if (attrib.format->isPureInt())
349 {
350 functions->vertexAttribIPointer(attribIndex, attrib.format->channelCount,
351 gl::ToGLenum(attrib.format->vertexAttribType),
352 attrib.vertexAttribArrayStride, newPointer);
353 }
354 else
355 {
356 functions->vertexAttribPointer(attribIndex, attrib.format->channelCount,
357 gl::ToGLenum(attrib.format->vertexAttribType),
358 attrib.format->isNorm(),
359 attrib.vertexAttribArrayStride, newPointer);
360 }
361 }
362 }
363 }
364
365 return attribToUpdateMask;
366}
367
368void ContextGL::resetUpdatedAttributes(gl::AttributesMask attribMask)
369{
370 const FunctionsGL *functions = getFunctions();
371 for (size_t attribIndex : attribMask)
372 {
373 const gl::VertexAttribute &attrib =
374 mState.getVertexArray()->getVertexAttributes()[attribIndex];
375 const gl::VertexBinding &binding =
376 (mState.getVertexArray()->getVertexBindings())[attrib.bindingIndex];
377 getStateManager()->bindBuffer(
378 gl::BufferBinding::Array,
379 GetImplAs<BufferGL>(binding.getBuffer().get())->getBufferID());
380 if (attrib.format->isPureInt())
381 {
382 functions->vertexAttribIPointer(static_cast<GLuint>(attribIndex),
383 attrib.format->channelCount,
384 gl::ToGLenum(attrib.format->vertexAttribType),
385 attrib.vertexAttribArrayStride, attrib.pointer);
386 }
387 else
388 {
389 functions->vertexAttribPointer(
390 static_cast<GLuint>(attribIndex), attrib.format->channelCount,
391 gl::ToGLenum(attrib.format->vertexAttribType), attrib.format->isNorm(),
392 attrib.vertexAttribArrayStride, attrib.pointer);
393 }
394 }
395}
396
397angle::Result ContextGL::drawArraysInstancedBaseInstance(const gl::Context *context,
398 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
399 GLint first,
400 GLsizei count,
401 GLsizei instanceCount,
402 GLuint baseInstance)
403{
404 GLsizei adjustedInstanceCount = instanceCount;
405 const gl::Program *program = context->getState().getProgram();
406 if (program->usesMultiview())
407 {
408 adjustedInstanceCount *= program->getNumViews();
409 }
410
411 ANGLE_TRY(setDrawArraysState(context, first, count, adjustedInstanceCount));
412
413 const FunctionsGL *functions = getFunctions();
414
415 if (functions->drawArraysInstancedBaseInstance)
416 {
417 // GL 4.2+ or GL_EXT_base_instance
418 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context,
419 functions->drawArraysInstancedBaseInstance(
420 ToGLenum(mode), first, count, adjustedInstanceCount, baseInstance));
421 }
422 else
423 {
424 // GL 3.3+ or GLES 3.2+
425 // TODO(http://anglebug.com/3910): This is a temporary solution by setting and resetting
426 // pointer offset calling vertexAttribPointer Will refactor stateCache and pass baseInstance
427 // to setDrawArraysState to set pointer offset
428
429 gl::AttributesMask attribToResetMask =
430 updateAttributesForBaseInstance(program, baseInstance);
431
432 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, functions->drawArraysInstanced(ToGLenum(mode), first, count,
433 adjustedInstanceCount));
434
435 resetUpdatedAttributes(attribToResetMask);
436 }
437
438 return angle::Result::Continue;
439}
440
441angle::Result ContextGL::drawElements(const gl::Context *context,
442 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
443 GLsizei count,
444 gl::DrawElementsType type,
445 const void *indices)
446{
447 const gl::State &glState = context->getState();
448 const gl::Program *program = glState.getProgram();
449 const bool usesMultiview = program->usesMultiview();
450 const GLsizei instanceCount = usesMultiview ? program->getNumViews() : 0;
451 const void *drawIndexPtr = nullptr;
452
453#if defined(ANGLE_STATE_VALIDATION_ENABLED)
454 validateState();
455#endif // ANGLE_STATE_VALIDATION_ENABLED
456
457 ANGLE_TRY(setDrawElementsState(context, count, type, indices, instanceCount, &drawIndexPtr));
458 if (!usesMultiview)
459 {
460 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, getFunctions()->drawElements(ToGLenum(mode), count, ToGLenum(type),
461 drawIndexPtr));
462 }
463 else
464 {
465 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context,
466 getFunctions()->drawElementsInstanced(ToGLenum(mode), count, ToGLenum(type),
467 drawIndexPtr, instanceCount));
468 }
469 return angle::Result::Continue;
470}
471
472angle::Result ContextGL::drawElementsBaseVertex(const gl::Context *context,
473 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
474 GLsizei count,
475 gl::DrawElementsType type,
476 const void *indices,
477 GLint baseVertex)
478{
479 const gl::State &glState = context->getState();
480 const gl::Program *program = glState.getProgram();
481 const bool usesMultiview = program->usesMultiview();
482 const GLsizei instanceCount = usesMultiview ? program->getNumViews() : 0;
483 const void *drawIndexPtr = nullptr;
484
485#if defined(ANGLE_STATE_VALIDATION_ENABLED)
486 validateState();
487#endif // ANGLE_STATE_VALIDATION_ENABLED
488
489 ANGLE_TRY(setDrawElementsState(context, count, type, indices, instanceCount, &drawIndexPtr));
490 if (!usesMultiview)
491 {
492 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, getFunctions()->drawElementsBaseVertex(
493 ToGLenum(mode), count, ToGLenum(type), drawIndexPtr, baseVertex));
494 }
495 else
496 {
497 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, getFunctions()->drawElementsInstancedBaseVertex(
498 ToGLenum(mode), count, ToGLenum(type), drawIndexPtr,
499 instanceCount, baseVertex));
500 }
501 return angle::Result::Continue;
502}
503
504angle::Result ContextGL::drawElementsInstanced(const gl::Context *context,
505 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
506 GLsizei count,
507 gl::DrawElementsType type,
508 const void *indices,
509 GLsizei instances)
510{
511 GLsizei adjustedInstanceCount = instances;
512 const gl::Program *program = context->getState().getProgram();
513 if (program->usesMultiview())
514 {
515 adjustedInstanceCount *= program->getNumViews();
516 }
517 const void *drawIndexPointer = nullptr;
518
519 ANGLE_TRY(setDrawElementsState(context, count, type, indices, adjustedInstanceCount,
520 &drawIndexPointer));
521 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context,
522 getFunctions()->drawElementsInstanced(ToGLenum(mode), count, ToGLenum(type),
523 drawIndexPointer, adjustedInstanceCount));
524 return angle::Result::Continue;
525}
526
527angle::Result ContextGL::drawElementsInstancedBaseVertex(const gl::Context *context,
528 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
529 GLsizei count,
530 gl::DrawElementsType type,
531 const void *indices,
532 GLsizei instances,
533 GLint baseVertex)
534{
535 GLsizei adjustedInstanceCount = instances;
536 const gl::Program *program = context->getState().getProgram();
537 if (program->usesMultiview())
538 {
539 adjustedInstanceCount *= program->getNumViews();
540 }
541 const void *drawIndexPointer = nullptr;
542
543 ANGLE_TRY(setDrawElementsState(context, count, type, indices, adjustedInstanceCount,
544 &drawIndexPointer));
545 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, getFunctions()->drawElementsInstancedBaseVertex(
546 ToGLenum(mode), count, ToGLenum(type), drawIndexPointer,
547 adjustedInstanceCount, baseVertex));
548 return angle::Result::Continue;
549}
550
551angle::Result ContextGL::drawElementsInstancedBaseVertexBaseInstance(const gl::Context *context,
552 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
553 GLsizei count,
554 gl::DrawElementsType type,
555 const void *indices,
556 GLsizei instances,
557 GLint baseVertex,
558 GLuint baseInstance)
559{
560 GLsizei adjustedInstanceCount = instances;
561 const gl::Program *program = context->getState().getProgram();
562 if (program->usesMultiview())
563 {
564 adjustedInstanceCount *= program->getNumViews();
565 }
566 const void *drawIndexPointer = nullptr;
567
568 ANGLE_TRY(setDrawElementsState(context, count, type, indices, adjustedInstanceCount,
569 &drawIndexPointer));
570
571 const FunctionsGL *functions = getFunctions();
572
573 if (functions->drawElementsInstancedBaseVertexBaseInstance)
574 {
575 // GL 4.2+ or GL_EXT_base_instance
576 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, functions->drawElementsInstancedBaseVertexBaseInstance(
577 ToGLenum(mode), count, ToGLenum(type), drawIndexPointer,
578 adjustedInstanceCount, baseVertex, baseInstance));
579 }
580 else
581 {
582 // GL 3.3+ or GLES 3.2+
583 // TODO(http://anglebug.com/3910): same as above
584 gl::AttributesMask attribToResetMask =
585 updateAttributesForBaseInstance(program, baseInstance);
586
587 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, functions->drawElementsInstancedBaseVertex(
588 ToGLenum(mode), count, ToGLenum(type), drawIndexPointer,
589 adjustedInstanceCount, baseVertex));
590
591 resetUpdatedAttributes(attribToResetMask);
592 }
593
594 return angle::Result::Continue;
595}
596
597angle::Result ContextGL::drawRangeElements(const gl::Context *context,
598 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
599 GLuint start,
600 GLuint end,
601 GLsizei count,
602 gl::DrawElementsType type,
603 const void *indices)
604{
605 const gl::Program *program = context->getState().getProgram();
606 const bool usesMultiview = program->usesMultiview();
607 const GLsizei instanceCount = usesMultiview ? program->getNumViews() : 0;
608 const void *drawIndexPointer = nullptr;
609
610 ANGLE_TRY(
611 setDrawElementsState(context, count, type, indices, instanceCount, &drawIndexPointer));
612 if (!usesMultiview)
613 {
614 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, getFunctions()->drawRangeElements(ToGLenum(mode), start, end, count,
615 ToGLenum(type), drawIndexPointer));
616 }
617 else
618 {
619 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context,
620 getFunctions()->drawElementsInstanced(ToGLenum(mode), count, ToGLenum(type),
621 drawIndexPointer, instanceCount));
622 }
623 return angle::Result::Continue;
624}
625
626angle::Result ContextGL::drawRangeElementsBaseVertex(const gl::Context *context,
627 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
628 GLuint start,
629 GLuint end,
630 GLsizei count,
631 gl::DrawElementsType type,
632 const void *indices,
633 GLint baseVertex)
634{
635 const gl::Program *program = context->getState().getProgram();
636 const bool usesMultiview = program->usesMultiview();
637 const GLsizei instanceCount = usesMultiview ? program->getNumViews() : 0;
638 const void *drawIndexPointer = nullptr;
639
640 ANGLE_TRY(
641 setDrawElementsState(context, count, type, indices, instanceCount, &drawIndexPointer));
642 if (!usesMultiview)
643 {
644 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, getFunctions()->drawRangeElementsBaseVertex(
645 ToGLenum(mode), start, end, count, ToGLenum(type),
646 drawIndexPointer, baseVertex));
647 }
648 else
649 {
650 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, getFunctions()->drawElementsInstancedBaseVertex(
651 ToGLenum(mode), count, ToGLenum(type), drawIndexPointer,
652 instanceCount, baseVertex));
653 }
654 return angle::Result::Continue;
655}
656
657angle::Result ContextGL::drawArraysIndirect(const gl::Context *context,
658 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
659 const void *indirect)
660{
661 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, getFunctions()->drawArraysIndirect(ToGLenum(mode), indirect));
662 return angle::Result::Continue;
663}
664
665angle::Result ContextGL::drawElementsIndirect(const gl::Context *context,
666 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
667 gl::DrawElementsType type,
668 const void *indirect)
669{
670 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context,
671 getFunctions()->drawElementsIndirect(ToGLenum(mode), ToGLenum(type), indirect));
672 return angle::Result::Continue;
673}

675angle::Result ContextGL::multiDrawArrays(const gl::Context *context,
676 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
677 const GLint *firsts,
678 const GLsizei *counts,
679 GLsizei drawcount)
680{
681 return rx::MultiDrawArraysGeneral(this, context, mode, firsts, counts, drawcount);
682}

684angle::Result ContextGL::multiDrawArraysInstanced(const gl::Context *context,
685 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
686 const GLint *firsts,
687 const GLsizei *counts,
688 const GLsizei *instanceCounts,
689 GLsizei drawcount)
690{
691 return rx::MultiDrawArraysInstancedGeneral(this, context, mode, firsts, counts, instanceCounts,
692 drawcount);
693}

717angle::Result ContextGL::multiDrawArraysInstancedBaseInstance(const gl::Context *context,
718 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
719 const GLint *firsts,
720 const GLsizei *counts,
721 const GLsizei *instanceCounts,

728
729angle::Result ContextGL::multiDrawElementsInstancedBaseVertexBaseInstance(
730 const gl::Context *context,
731 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
732 const GLsizei *counts,
733 gl::DrawElementsType type,
734 const GLvoid *const *indices,
735 const GLsizei *instanceCounts,
736 const GLint *baseVertices,
737 const GLuint *baseInstances,
738 GLsizei drawcount)
739{
740 return rx::MultiDrawElementsInstancedBaseVertexBaseInstanceGeneral(
741 this, context, mode, counts, type, indices, instanceCounts, baseVertices, baseInstances,
742 drawcount);
743}
744
745gl::GraphicsResetStatus ContextGL::getResetStatus()
746{
747 gl::GraphicsResetStatus resetStatus = mRenderer->getResetStatus();
748 if (resetStatus == gl::GraphicsResetStatus::PurgedContextResetNV)
749 {
750 if (mRobustnessVideoMemoryPurgeStatus == RobustnessVideoMemoryPurgeStatus::NOT_REQUESTED)
751 {
752 resetStatus = gl::GraphicsResetStatus::UnknownContextReset;
753 }
754 }
755 return resetStatus;
756}
757

759{
760 return mRenderer->getVendorString();
761}

763std::string ContextGL::getRendererDescription() const
764{
765 return mRenderer->getRendererDescription();
766}

771 return angle::Result::Continue;

791 mRenderer->pushDebugGroup(source, id, message);
792 return angle::Result::Continue;

798 return angle::Result::Continue;

822}
